verbs.description: Apple Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook , [V: leveraged] [ARG1: buy - out billionaire] Henry Kravis and Blackstone Group CEO Stephen Schwarzman were among the guests Tuesday at the first state dinner of Donald Trump ’s presidency , a formal fete for French President Emmanuel Macron .
